productDescription: Catan is a strategy game where players collect resources and use them to build roads, settlements and cities on their way to victory. The board itself is variable, making each game a little different from the next.
Chess is a board game for two players. It is played in a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side.
Scrabble is a word game in which two to four players score points by placing tiles, each bearing a single letter, onto a game board divided into a 15Ã—15 grid of squares.
